title: Suggestion: Ranked match making based on location
body:
I would really love to see Riot implement a ranked match making system that works based on location i.e. get to play against Australian's. I've noticed a common issue is language barrier and a lot of asian countries prefer not to speak english. That's cool and all but I'd love to be able to communicate with my team mates, especially as it's ranked. 

That and I'm sick of ff 20, you such noob, bot lane noob gg

replies.body: I don't see how this is really something they can address so easily. Players have to play somewhere and we aren't really a region that can afford to lose players.
I'm not very keen on hour long ques after 1am because some poor sod is sick of being called a noob by foreigners.

People are on the Oceanic server mostly because they are in the Oceanic region.
Basically, that is already in place.
Most of the foreigners are in low elo anyway. Git gud so u dont have to play qwith them. Or, avoid ranked in the early hours of the morning
That and I'm sure non English speaking countries would prefer to speak their native language with each other. I just see this as being a very logical implementation
